features: FRESH BREATH － Bad breath no more. Uncle Harry's Miracle Mouthwash naturally balances pH levels in your mouth by neutralizing microbes that contribute to bad breath and dry mouth, leaving you minty fresh all day long. Using it regularly also revitalizes the appearance of your teeth and gums to help you maintain an eye-catching smile.

TOTAL DENTAL HYGIENE － Not only does Miracle Mouthwash whiten teeth and refresh, but one minute of gargling also reduces swelling, and flushes out irritants by naturally maintaining your mouth’s natural alkaline pH. It's safe and non toxic, and can even help soothe a sore throat when gargled.

STRENGTHEN TEETH － Save your teeth and gums with Uncle Harry's tooth repair mouthwash formula. It encourages remineralization of tooth enamel by supplying your teeth with essential vitamins and minerals it needs to stay strong and healthy, like calcium, magnesium, and phosphorus.

NATURAL MOUTHWASH － Kill bad breath and whiten naturally with natural ingredients: Purified, deionized, microfiltered water and ten parts per million of silver mineral (99.000% pure), calcium carbonate (natural chalk), sea salt, mustard seed powder, magnetic earth, active ionic minerals, peppermint oil, eucalyptus, clove, wintergreen, and oregano essential oils.

CLEAN & QUALITY － This Uncle Harrys alcohol free mouthwash is completely fluoride free, gluten free, glycerin free, and vegan to meet even the most sensitive and conscious tooth needs. Our 100% natural oral rinse treatments are formulated without synthetic preservatives, carrageenan, triclosan, and artificial sweeteners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the fresh feel in my mouth. This cleared up mouth tenderness left from other toothpaste brands and I had instant relief. No other brand for me. Thus is the best ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels like a better clean
reviews.reviewText: To dilute it a little I would put a cap full of water in my mouth before a cap full of product. It really made my mouth feel fresher and clean with a natural taste. Only difference is you are supposed to use it for 1 minute to 5 minutes. Where as other mouthwashes are only 30 seconds. But the extra time swishing in your mouth is well worth it in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to adjust to the flavor, but I like the mouthwash and use it daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great product has really helped
reviews.reviewText: Loving the product best mouth wash I've used in a long time, not bad tasting (I do have weird taste though lol) but it's been very helpful for my sensitive teeth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 2 years later still the best mouth wash eve

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve loved this product for years, but had only purchased at a health food store in the past. I couldn’t find it in my new town. This was my first online purchase of mouthwash. I really appreciate the seller taping and wrapping the bottle well so no leaks or loss of product in shipping. A little goes a long way with this mouthwash, you mix it with water when taking. A bottle can last a long time, using a dash at a time. Product delivered fast. I would definitely purchase from this seller again. I think this is the healthiest mouthwash on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Strong cleaning sensation. I noticed my teeth being less sensitive right after swishing. Keeps mouth feeling cleaner for longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars On the fence
reviews.reviewText: Lately I’ve been having more cavities and tooth pain. I bought this based on reviews in hopes it would help. After the first use (1/2 water, 1/2 mouth wash) my mouth did feel cleaner and my teeth were shiny, but my taste buds are destroyed. They are both burned off and offended. The taste of this product is like swishing with old lady perfume. It’s horrible. The bottle says there’s no need to rinse after use. I can assure you I rinsed-many, many, many times. If I’m brave, I will keep it up for a week diluted 2:1 water, mouth wash and see how it goes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Ĺove this fresh feeling it leaves!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: it took my taste away after a few days of using, hopefully it will come back....i think this stock is out of date...
